main: ^Oh hi, you must be the Detective, thanks for coming!
^Nice to meet you, what's your name?
Greet: ^I'm Charlotte, Peter's wife. Please find out who did this to my husband.
reply: ^I don't really know anything, all I could tell you is that in the past couple of days Peter was distant.
reply1: ^Please figure out what happened here, I don't want anyone else in this town to go through what I'm going through.
